nodes.bodyText: Was there no specific reason for this be this way? I think we talked about this in its moment, but don't remember right now.

Yes, I though that when both the distribution and the extension had a version of a class, the version of the extension should be used. But I was wrong.
One of the side effects is that extensions that use a different sdk-api version than the distro have issues creating the extension model because the annotations do not match when tested.
